text: Martin Kippenberger (25 February 1953 – 7 March 1997) was a German artist. He was a painter, sculptor, installation artist, among other activities. He was one of the most important German painters of his generation, the same as Albert Oehlen, his brother Markus Oehlen, and Günther Förg. ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1953 births Category:1997 deaths Category:German painters Category:German sculptors
title: Martin Kippenberger
